sect2.title: Installation of Man
sect2.para: Run the following commands to install man:

screen.userinput: PATH=$PATH:/usr/bin:/bin \ ./configure -default -confdir=/etc && make && cp src/man.conf{,.backup} && sed -e '/^NROFF/s/-mandoc/-c -mandoc/' \ src/man.conf.backup > src/man.conf && make install

sect2.para: You may want to take a look at the man hint at which deals with formatting and compression issues for man pages.
